name: Project West Law
description:
This is my very first project fully made in Unity 3d. The game project is based on the idea of one of my favorite arcade of all the time, Blood Bros. 

Follow the adventures of the Sheriff, Jack "Lo Smilzo", while fighting waves of bandits in the old wild west !

Basic Movement and Commands:

Mouse for aim

Left mouse button, fire

Right mouse button, reload

Arrow Keys Left and Right or A and D move the player left and right

Arrow Key Down or S for knee

Space for Roll based on the direction of player movement.

C throw Dynamite.

P Pause the Game

R Restart

Q Quit (only for Windows)
